channel.title: Eotenweard - Hospitality
channel.description: This is a series of my own PbtA game in development of Dark Age heroes given gifts by their god(s) to protect the innocent from the supernatural while being manipulated by those same fickle and jealous gods. 5 sessions on Saturdays in January 2021 at 7.00pm (GMT) ![AR's Eotenweard Gauntlet AP Video Thumbnail|377x500](upload://s8vYEDBk1brWFtGaGoCXGETHAz9.jpeg) @Tylom will be a guest in this series. Sat 2 Jan: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-ML9IovzlT0K9P8jU3nZ Sat 9 Jan: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-ML9J9HrCvbhluWo1W4O Sat 16 Jan: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-ML9JNPrdm6ZU5b4H6h8 Sat 23 Jan: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-ML9JjykuqHu8OXTD5Rr Sat 30 Jan: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-ML9JwLA9s7uU5CQKw4u

item.title: Eotenweard - Hospitality
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

Eotenweard - Hospitality (4/5)
Hild the Outlaw returns from a day and a night trying to integrate Woden’s experience on the World Tree with the crucifixion of the Christ God, only to attract the anger of a flock of ravens. Meanwhile, the local smith casts weapons of bronze for Cennus, the Sword of God, and Eadric the Commoner. Gildas the Fae Changeling is already so armed for what they all expect to be a conflict with a Fae Lady over the fate of an unquiet spirit. There’s a haunted ancient hillfort, the ghosts of Rome, and a pack of wolves … then … a descent into darkness … and a chicken with an unerring sense of direction …

Read full topic

item.title: Eotenweard - Hospitality
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

Eotenweard - Hospitality (3/5)
Having gone against his God and freed the lordless men they captured, Cennus the Sword of God expriences regret and then Wrath as Eadric the Commoner confronts him with what they had done. Gildas the Fae Changeling, meanwhile, casts a worried eye on the stone circle they have come to find as it overlooks the place of murder. There is a Fae Lord holding what they have, an indulgence of Lust, and another confrontation in Aelfburh’s great hall … then there’s the certanity that its Lord will have an hier and a trial by combat that gives Cennus a chance to assuage his guilt with revenge …

Read full topic

item.title: Eotenweard - Hospitality
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

Eotenweard - Hospitality (2/5)
Hild confronts Bardwulf, the Lord of Aethelburh, while Cennus ensures proud thane Madog will honour the debt he owes him if called to do so. Meanwhile, Eadric and Gildas visit the tracherous ravine where Bardwulf’s first wife met her untimely end and seek answers from her unquiet spirit. There’s the feast of Blodmonath, a failed attempt to retrieve a moonstone, and tensions that almost turn violent at the wedding feast … and then there’s an ambush …

Read full topic

item.title: Eotenweard - Hospitality
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

Eotenweard - Hospitality (1/5)
The heroes arrive at the village of Aethelburh and are granted hospitality by its grim Lord, but their arrival seems to trigger a supernatural event to which one of them is tied by their previous life. There’s an unquiet spirit, an inquisitive chicken and a secret hinted at … then Woden and a Fae Lord take different degrees of interest while the Christ God turns their face away …

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Alun_R

@Alun_R wrote:

This is a series of my own PbtA game in development of Dark Age heroes given gifts by their god(s) to protect the innocent from the supernatural while being manipulated by those same fickle and jealous gods.
5 sessions on Saturdays in January 2021 at 7.00pm (GMT)
